description: Investigate Your Friends is a drinking game where you get to learn who you're friends really are!

solo.can you quack: drink three times if you've ever quacked like duck during sex
solo.golden showers: drink one for each time you received a golden shower
solo.lightning mcqueen: drink three if the heelies stayed on during sex
solo.rap sheet: drink one for each law you have broken
solo.two faced: drink four if you've ever peed in someones garden

group.professional: recount your most awkward moment in the work place, most awkward drinks
